title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 338.2 - Term appointments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 338.2 - Term appointments

State Regulations

The services of academic and professional employees
having term appointments shall cease automatically at the end of their
specified terms. There shall be no right of appeal from a nonrenewal of a term
appointment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
338.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
